title: Mercury Transit in the 7th House for Taurus Ascendant
summary: Mercury transiting the 7th house emphasizes communication within partnerships, marriage, and professional alliances. Dialogue becomes central to resolving differences and shaping agreements. This phase favors negotiations, contracts, and client-facing roles, where clarity and adaptability bring progress. However, overanalysis or excessive debate can dilute trust and create misunderstandings. When guided with balance and listening, this transit supports intelligent compromise, mutually beneficial decisions, and stable relationship dynamics through thoughtful exchange.
closing: Mercury in the 7th house refines partnerships through dialogue. Balanced communication converts discussion into durable cooperation.
